doc.title: MonsterFest 2000: The Classics Come Alive
doc.plot: Following in the footsteps of famed film historian Robert Osborne from Turner Classic Movies, Whoopie Goldberg and co-host Linda Blair share the spotlight while introducing classic horror films from the 1930's through the 1960's. They offer a behind the scenes glimpse into the making of such legendary movies like The Wolf Man, Frankenstein, The Invisible Man and Dracula, all of which were filmed at Universal Studios. This TV special aired on the AMC (American Movie Classics) channel during Halloween week of 2000.
